articles.title: The bear is Back! Movie threequel Paddington In Peru 'is set to begin filming in July' - Daily Mail
articles.description: It's expected that actor Ben Whishaw, who voices Paddington, will return for the third instalment, and there is talk of an extended family of bear cousins for fans to get to know
articles.content:
Paddington In Peru is reportedly set to begin filming in July.
According to Deadline, the Paddington Bear movie threequel is due to start production on July 24.

articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: Seymour Stein, music mogul who discovered Madonna, Talking Heads and more, dies aged 80 - The Guardian
articles.description: Influential executive co-founded Sire Records and signed Lou Reed, the Ramones and introduced the Smiths and the Cure to the US
articles.content:
Seymour Stein, the music executive who launched the careers of Madonna, Talking Heads and the Ramones, and introduced the Cure, Depeche Mode and the Smiths to America, has died aged 80.
